attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/RIGHTSOFPARENT/

ON NUMEROUS OCCASIONS I HAVE BEEN IN TOUCH TO SAY THAT MANY OF THOSE THAT HAVE SIGNED MY PETITION HAVE NOT BEEN ADDED.  THEIR MAY BE A FAULT...PLEASE CAN THE FAULT BE RIGHTED.

Most of the signatures have not been added!

THANK YOU

S ROTHWELL

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
